title: I got 3 Zed Mastery 7 Token but I can't unlock...
body: Because it says I need 1 Champion Shard, now I'm not the best at this hextech loot and crafting crap but please can someone tell me how to get Zed Champion Shard.

replies.body: When you right click your tokens via the Hextech Crafting pane, you will have several options to unlock the mastery.  You may select to spend 600 Champion essences with your tokens, instead of having to find a Zed shard through the store.  I looked into your specific issue, and it seems that you have all of the necessary ingredients to unlock your mastery now.  If you are still experiencing an issue with this, please reach out to player support by[ submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
thx, i just ended up using 600 blue essence. no luck on champion shard

In the store under the accessories tab, there is an option to buy a random champion shard for 195 RP or 1700 IP. You can possibly get the Zed champion shard from this. This does involve getting somewhat lucky, though.

There is another way to obtain mastery level 7, which is getting 600 blue essence. You get blue essence by disenchanting champion shards.

Good luck.
